org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Title

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Title
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsScriptableFontProvider<ChartContext>, IsScriptablePaddingProvider<ChartContext>

    public class Title
extends Object
implements IsScriptableFontProvider<ChartContext>, IsScriptablePaddingProvider<ChartContext>
    Configures the chart title which defines text to draw at the top of the chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
